setIconStyle

public void setIconStyle(java.lang.String iconStyle)
Sets the bar's icon style. The style name should match a CSS style that specifies a background image using the following format: 

 .my-icon {
    background: url(images/icons/my-icon.png) no-repeat center left !important;
 }

Parameters:
iconStyle - the icon style
